code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{login}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await login(username,password);if(response.token){localStorage.setItem('token',response.token);navigate('/dashboard');}else{setError('Invalid response from server');}}catch(err){setError(err.message||'Invalid username or password');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"window login-window",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"window-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"OSGB System - Login"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"window-content",children:[error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"alert alert-warning",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"form-label",children:"Username:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-input",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"form-label",children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",className:"form-input",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Login"})]})]})]})});};export default Login;
